text: is a Japanese language video game magazine. It is published by Enterbrain, Inc. and Tokuma. Currently, there are five Famitsū magazines: Shūkan Famitsū, Famitsū PS3 + PSP, Famitsū Xbox 360, Famitsū Wii+DS, and Famitsū Wave DVD. is the original Famitsū magazine. It is known as the mostly read and respected video game news magazine in Japan. == References == == Other websites == *Official website Category:Monthly magazines
title: Famitsu
